title: Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: In the package view outline, when double clicking on a type import statement, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Open the package view outline.  2. Double click on a type import statement.  3. Observe that the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
